abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32761898, pmid32744591, pmid32687485, pmid32761993, pmid32761839, pmid32628534, pmid32752979, pmid32749458, pmid32770758, pmid32762116, pmid32762140, pmid32761492, pmid32762083, pmid32749759, pmid32680520
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.08.12
